name: Demonoid - Damien Skin
description:
Re-skin of Demonoid. Lots of silver, and the Demon is RED.
Also removed some empty space & a few other annoyances.

Note: This WILL screw up the viewability of the Demonoid forums. 
This is due to Simple Machines Forum's hack-job CSS coding. 
I cannot do anything about this. 
I removed the Forums link from the main page though. 
So if you use Demonoid's forums, don't use this style.


If you have problems with images not loading:
---------------------------------------------------------
For a base 64 code, you can go here: http://bit.ly/hrc4Gx
Userstyles.org won't let me upload it cause it is waaaay 
too many characters, so you'll have to input it manually.
additional_info:
• May 24th, 2010:
	-Added lots of CSS text effects. 
	-Did a few more tweaks...
• May 27th, 2010:
	-More color fixes, added some category icons...
• December 4th, 2010:
	-Updated for their new .ME domain.
• January 10th, 2011 
	-Updated for their new magnet link function. 
	-Changed Download, Audio Category & Sort By icon as well. 
	-Also, different torrent health bars, FINALLY!
• January 26th, 2011
	-Added .cc to domains list
	-Moved imagehosts since it is going down in a month or so. (CRITICAL UPDATE) 
• February 2nd, 2011
	-Added IP addresses to domains list since many people are using only IP addresses due to ICE domain seizures. 
• May 22nd, 2015
	-New .pw, .ph & .biz domains added, some tweaks to remove sponsor links, made ".red" text background black, new forum link removed also.
